item.description: There will be a presentation.Byron Hobson will be speaking,he is an acknowledged expert on "CREDIT RESTORATION".He utilizes the F.C.R.A.Sec.609,in ways that work like magic to most people.This meeting is a "MUST" for mortgage professionals and Real Estate agents and brokers.It is also of great interest to those of us who invest or want to invest in RE.Good credit is not always necessary,but is a big help in putting together transactions.As usual those who show up early will have the Bonus of being able to have some time alone to ask ?s.
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club April Meetup
